group_1.textRight: It was worth the effort to squeeze in all that@brain power.
That’s right, I was the one behind my own bullying.
But, does it matter?
What are you gonna do now that you’ve solved@the whodunnit?

group_1.textLeft: ...Good question, buddy.
What am I gonna do?
It's not like you're really being bullied or anything.
It seems like you want to be isolated.
At any rate, I tried to provoke you, but...
How can I save you, and from what?

group_1.textRight: I don't need no saving, so just go home.

group_1.textLeft: But, you’re having trouble sleeping, arentcha?

group_1.textRight: What are you... talking about...?

group_1.textLeft: I know it when I see it, buddy.
I can tell that it's not just because you’re staying@up late.
And I’ve also found out about the events that@brought it on.
I heard about it from a Magical Girl I happened@to meet.
About the epic war you guys had in Futatsugi.
Apparently, you haven't been able to sleep since.

group_1.textRight: That babbling gamer bitch...
So what? You think you understand how I feel@now?
Oh, I battled epically with my friends!
That's why my sensitive ass can't sleep...?@That's why I stopped making friends, huh?
I'm not a fan of that.
I'm not that goddamn fragile!

group_1.textLeft: I didn't mean it like that...

group_1.textRight: Sure! Then let me tell you... something no one@else knows.
In that battle, I...
My DEAREST, MOST BELOVED best friend!
I KILLED her, with my OWN hands!!

group_1.textLeft: What...

group_1.textRight: We bumped into each other in that battle,@and I... for my own duty...
I can't forget... the feeling of that moment...@the feeling of death...
Every single night I dream about her, about that@moment.
She had such a toned, healthy body, with a@strong core...
Yet, her final kick made a cute, little, popping@sound... and then...

group_1.textLeft: Enough!
...I got it now, so...

group_1.textRight: You're the one who asked!
What do you mean, "I got it"?! You mean "I can't@stand to hear it"?!
YOU’RE the fragile one here!

group_1.textLeft: That's not it.
At last, I got it.
The way... to save you, buddy.

group_1.textRight: Save me?! What the HELL are you going to save@me from?!

group_1.textLeft: Nightmares.
I knew what I had to do from the very beginning.
I'm gonna free you from your nightmares.
And for that reason, I shall become your best friend.
You and I were destined to meet.

group_1.textRight: Didn't you hear what I said?
Just leave me alone! Don't try to become something@to me!
I've had enough already... I'm scared of making@friends...
'Cause every time I do... they become my enemies,@and I kill them again!!

group_1.textLeft: You ain't gonna win any awards for closing off@your heart on account of that, y'know?

group_1.textRight: [chara:305800:effect_7001_attack02][surround:3021A01]Shut the hell up!
I've had enough. I'm not killing my friends again!
[chara:305800:effect_7000_attack01][surround:3021A01]Don't turn me into a friend-killer!
[chara:305800:effect_7001_attack02][surround:3021A01]I don't want to be friends with you when we're@in a position to kill each other!
*Pant*...*pant*... I mean... why...
Why are you even doing all of this for me in the@first place...?!
You have NO obligation to do this!!

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.0][chara:305800:eyeClose_0][chara:305800:cheek_0][chara:305800:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:305800:lipSynch_1]Heh. Of course I do.
Because you're my best friend!

group_1.textRight: ...Looks like getting on people's nerves really is@your specialty, huh.
[chara:305800:effect_7001_attack02][surround:3021A01]If talking is wasted on you... then I shall kill you.
[chara:305800:effect_7000_attack01][surround:3021A01]I'll kill you before we become friends!

group_1.textLeft: Right, you do that! And watch me save you!
Come on, kill me!
'Cause you best believe I ain't gonna die!!
What I'm gonna do is become your immortal@best friend!
This is the one and only way I can save you!
